titles: A good husband and a good wife layd open in a sermon, preached by Mr Thomas Taylor ... ; and published by Iohn Sedguuicke.
author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
Sedgwick, John, 1600 or 1601-1643.
publisher: Printed for VVilliam Sheffard and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
